Class JumperBug

java.lang.Object
  info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      info.gridworld.actor.Bug
          JumperBug

public class JumperBug
extends info.gridworld.actor.Bug

JumperBug can jump two spaces at a time, but it can jump only over a rock, a flower, or a blank space and only onto a flower or blank space. Otherwise, it acts like a normal bug and moves one space or turns until it can move.

Version:
September 22, 2016
Author:
Alex Yu

Constructor Summary
JumperBug()
          Construcs a JumperBug.
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Jumps if able; if not, then acts like a normal bug until then.
 boolean canJump()
          Checks if there is an empty space, flower, or rock directly in front and if there is an empty space or flower two spaces ahead.
 void jump()
          Jumps two spaces in front without leaving a trail of flowers.
 void move()
          Moves one space forward without leaving a trail of flowers.

Overrides:

canJump

public boolean canJump()
Checks if there is an empty space, flower, or rock directly in front and if there is an empty space or flower two spaces ahead.

Returns:
true if the spaces in front are valid to jump; otherwise, false

jump

public void jump()
Jumps two spaces in front without leaving a trail of flowers.

Precondition:
the jump is a legal jump

move

Moves one space forward without leaving a trail of flowers.
